Activity: Morning check-in: emails and market news. Grab a coffee, of course.

Refine the fund performance tracking framework. Focus on the data inputs needed from the trading system and data science team to calculate the KPIs. @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3 (Quantitative Researchers) should be considered when collecting required parameters.

Integrate fund performance and expense tracking framework together. Identify dependencies and potential data flow issues.
